summary: IT systems and operational technology—like sensors and radar—are critical for U.S. Coast Guard operations. However, Coast Guard has a long history of problems managing these resources. The Coast Guard plans to spend $93 million in fiscal year 2022 to improve its IT systems and infrastructure. But the Coast Guard still doesn't fully assess its IT network capacity needs. For example, it doesn't test bandwidth limits...
title: Coast Guard: Actions Needed to Enhance IT Program Implementation
